overview.en: STTC chain is an open ecology of self-drive sharing, and users actually generate great value through their own behaviors.STTC travel chain aims to build a decentralized global travel and travel platform. It gathers all the content including eating, drinking and having fun. Through STTC travel chain technology, user's credit card and various effective behavior data will be transformed into digital assets that real users can control.
overview.zh: STTC优游链是一个自驱共享的开放生态，用户通过自身行为实际上产生巨大价值。STTC优游链旨在建设一个去中心化的全球旅游出行平台，它集聚了包括吃喝玩乐的所有内容，通过STTC优游链技术，用户的征信身份证，及各种有效行为数据将转化为真正的用户可以掌控的数字资产。
